system.note: Rare Availability if acquired from Dark Eldar Settlement. If wielder does not have training with this weapon, it counts as a Mono-Spear (and so inflicts no penalties to use if they have Melee Weapons Training (Primitive)). Often used alongside Shardnets.

description.value:
Special: Razor-Sharp

Note: Rare Availability if acquired from Dark Eldar Settlement. If wielder does not have training with this weapon, it counts as a Mono-Spear (and so inflicts no penalties to use if they have Melee Weapons Training (Primitive)). Often used alongside Shardnets.
